original_text: Jesus did many things when he was living on earth. He also taught people many things. I told you about all these things in the first book that I wrote for you, Theophilus.
korean_text: 데오빌로여 내가 먼저 쓴 글에는 무릇 예수께서 행하시며 가르치시기를 시작하심부터

sentences.original_text: when he was living on earth
He also taught people many things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 사람들에게 많은 것을 가르치셨습니다

sentences.original_text: I told you about all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 모든 것을 당신에게 말했고

sentences.original_text: in the first book that I wrote for you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신을 위해 쓴 첫 번째 책에서
